data.name: The Secrets of the Forest Demo
data.detailed_description:
This demo have a older version of The Secrets of The Forest, Will be updated when new versions launches in main game page.
You're Lucas Comap, A reporter, You receive a letter to investigate the mysterious forest, Mountain of leaves.
You objective is discover what's going on in this place, For this you'll need to complete the challenges of this place.
Game features:
  • A big open world map
  • Realistic graphics
  • Car system
  • And much more things !
data.about_the_game:
This demo have a older version of The Secrets of The Forest, Will be updated when new versions launches in main game page.
You're Lucas Comap, A reporter, You receive a letter to investigate the mysterious forest, Mountain of leaves.

data.short_description: This is the demo of The Secrets of The Forest, A exploration/adventure game into a Mysterious forest.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4130
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
